import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { TastingGroup } from '../models/tasting-group'; import { TastingGroupService } from '../services/tasting-group.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-groups', templateUrl: './groups.component.html', styleUrls: ['./groups.component.scss'] }) export class GroupsComponent implements OnInit { tastingGroups!: Array; groups$!: Observable; selectedGroup!: TastingGroup; showDetails = false; showAddGroup = false; constructor(private readonly router: Router, private readonly groupsService: TastingGroupService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.groups$ = this.groupsService.getAllTastingGroups(); console.log(this.groups$); } showGroupDetails(group: TastingGroup) { this.showDetails = true; this.selectedGroup = group; } }
